short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for neontools.io - Online Marketing and Social Media Tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension for neontools.io functionalities. 
This simple extension makes it possible to use the URL Shortener tool and Instagram Profile Audit tool directly in your browser, without accessing the platform.
More functionalities will be added over time. If you want to use all functions, please refer to the product website www.neontools.io.
